title: Bergamot Tobacco Nicotine Pouches by N!XS
description: TRY BERGAMOT TOBACCO NICOTINE POUCHES BY N!XS Looking for a unique flavour to really give your taste buds a treat? Then look no further than Bergamot Tobacco Nicotine Pouches by N!XS . The distinctive citrus flavour of Bergamot takes centre stage while the smokey tobacco taste provides the best of both worlds. KEY FEATURES: Bergamot and Tobacco flavoured nicotine pouches Great for quitting smoking Delicious and satisfying nicotine hit Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free Suitable for use in all environments Designed to fit under the lip comfortably MORE ABOUT BERGAMOT AND TOBACCO FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES A brilliant mixture that's perfect for those that crave the flavour of tobacco and also love a fruity twist. MORE ABOUT NICOTINE POUCHES N!XS' tobacco-free nicotine pouches are designed for effective nicotine satisfaction and delicious flavour. Each pouch has an all-white material, designed for ultimate comfort when placed under your lip. N!XS pouches are available in range of flavours and strengths, so make sure you check out the rest of the range. Additional Description Information: Brand Name: N!XS Product Type: Nicotine Pouches Pouch Format: Large Strength: Medium Nicotine per Pouch (mg/pouch) 8.0mg Flavour Name: Bergamot Tobacco Flavour: Bergamot and Tobacco Pouches per can: 20 Shipping from: London, UK
